Plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?
Title: Prisoners
Actors: Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal, Viola Davis, Maria Bello
tomatoConsensus: Prisoners has an emotional complexity and a sense of dread that makes for absorbing (and disturbing) viewing.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 33 nominations.
